title: Think Tank | Anton Ebsen
description: How I organize my knowledge, the tools I use, and my philosophy behind learning.

hero.title: Think Tank
hero.text: Handling complex information requires a system. Here are the tools and methods I use to connect the dots.

items.title: Obsidian
items.desc: My 'second brain'. This is where my atomic notes and connections between economic theories and code snippets live.

items.title: Readwise / Reader
items.desc: The entry point for all digital reading. Highlights from articles and books are automatically synced to Obsidian.

items.title: Notion
items.desc: Used for project management and high-level goals. This is where I plan my time and track my deliveries.

items.title: Zettelkasten
items.desc: I believe knowledge should be like a network, not folders. Every note should be small and connected to others.

items.title: Progressive Summarization
items.desc: I review my notes in layers, so the most important points always stand out over time.
